description: Patch Plan for Improving Experience: button[aria-expanded]:has-text("مثل: اختبار Smart Paste")

operations.content:
version: '3'

services:
  smart_paste_test:
    image: smart_paste_test_image
    ports:
      - "8080:80"
    environment:
      - SMART_PASTE_ENABLED=true
